Headline: #35 31st Temporary Reroute at 31st/Lock
ShortDescription: #35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Root/Normal
ShortDescription: EB 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Root, Normal, Pershing, Princeton & Root, due to street blockage near Root/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Root, Normal, Pershing, Princeton and Root, due to street blockage near Root/Normal.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
